name: OAK Adventure Catch Up
description:
OAK Adventure Catch Up

It's a Fun Game,  Easy to Play,  Play Time 3 - 5 Minutes to Single Player or Play with Your Kids.

Features

The Game is Very Easy to Play. You Play The Role of OAK to Catch all The Animals.

Developers Describe 

  • Play For Fun.
  • Do Not Play For a Long Time.
  • Parent Should Monitor and Give Advices During Children are Playing Video Game.
  • Thank You.

System Requirements (Minimum)

  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® 7 or Higher
  • CPU: Intel Core2 Duo or AMD Athlon™ 64
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics, Radeon HD Graphics or More
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB Available Space
  • Resolution 1280x768 or Better Display
